title: Minecraft |侠盗（GTA）|迈克尔的使命！
author: a1014689046
txt_content:
http://v.youku.com/v_show/id_XNzA2MTE3ODQw.html

介绍[音]：Today, I am playing another video in Grand Theft Auto (GTA) Minecraft. This time we are introduced to Michael De Santa, who has been keeping his eye on us. We may even end up helping him out..
[译]：今天，我在侠盗猎车打另一个视频（GTA）Minecraft。这一次我们介绍了迈克尔de Santa，谁一直关注着我们。我们甚至可能最终帮助他

【坑爹的百度翻译】
